mapper.select: select gs.*, m.title as matchName, u.name as userName, u.icon as userIcon, g.group_no as groupNo from ch_group_search as gs left join ch_group as g on g.group_no =gs.group_no and g.user_role='1' left join ch_user as u on u.id =g.user_id left join ch_match as m on m.id =gs.match_id where gs.id=#{groupSearchId}
